devdoc.details: Implementation of the basic standard fungible token.

allowance(address,address).details: check the amount of tokens that oprator can use

approve(address,uint256).details: approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf pf msg.sender

balanceOf(address).details: return the balance of the speified address

params.owner: the address to query the balance of

totalSupply().details: return the total number of fungible tokens in currency.

transfer(address,uint256).details: transfer token to a specified address by token owner

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: transfer tokens from owner to dest by oprator
